title: The Man With A Treasure
description: A Giordano Mafia NovelFrom award-winning author India R. Adams comes a Mafia Romance like no other, filled with secrets, lies, betrayal, and above all, faith...They called me the Angel of the Night.The savior.The valiant one.But I didn’t see it.All I saw were my failed attempts at saving the most precious treasure of all.No one knew where she was.Scarlett Giordano.She had been born in captivity and became the girl without hands.Finding her was my life’s purpose.My oath to the Giordanos.Who would have thought she would be the one to help me find myself?
author: India R. Adams
